article_title: Walgreens, CVS Want Doctors' Medicare Pay To Vaccinate

article_metadata.description: As the nation’s retail pharmacies move deeper into the business of providing healthcare services, they now want pharmacists to be paid by Medicare to immunize the nation’s seniors. Under legislation that is gaining rare bipartisan support and momentum in the U.S. House and Senate, particularly for a Congressional health bill, pharmacists [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
